manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_business` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `thumb` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `content` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `phone` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `qq` varchar(15) NOT NULL, `province` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `city` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `dist` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `address` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `lng` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `lat` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `industry1` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `industry2` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `createtime` int(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idx_lat_lng` (`lng`,`lat`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=3 ;
